properties.displayName: Uncommon Extension In Keyboard Layout IME File Registry Value
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (RegistryKey contains "\\Control\\Keyboard Layouts" and RegistryKey contains "Ime File") and (not(RegistryValueData endswith ".ime"))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects usage of Windows Input Method Editor (IME) keyboard layout feature, which allows an attacker to load a DLL into the process after sending the WM_INPUTLANGCHANGEREQUEST message.
